masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Honey, your grandmother is asking why you're not at Christmas dinner yet. Also, your cousin Marcus keeps asking if you know any 'real' superheroes and wants you to prove you're not one. The turkey is getting cold. Please hurry. And FIX YOUR HAIR."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Survive family interrogation about your 'extracurriculars'
  • Keep your secret identity intact from nosy relatives
